title: Looking For scrims between 7.30pm to 10 or 11 pm aest (sydney time)
body:
Hi we have a team of low Diamond players, so if you think you are of equal or better level we would love to be able to regularly scrim against you.

If your interested message either me ign NightTemplar or Elim thepinch to set up a time and day, also we would like for there to be no hold ups on the scrim start time as we would love to keep things flowing and sorry if we do leave to either scrim another teams or start a ranked 5's queues if your players arent available. and it applies vice versa.
